meanings.sent1: Before starting the project, the team will prespecify the requirements.
meanings.sent2: The teacher always prespecifies the homework assignments for the week.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to prespecify the ingredients for the secret recipe.
meanings.sent4: The captain prespecified the route for the ship, ensuring a smooth journey.
meanings.sent5: Prespecifying the rules helped avoid confusion during the game.

meanings.sent1: The weather forecast can help prespecify the conditions for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: It is important to prespecify the budget before starting the project.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller claimed to prespecify the future events.
meanings.sent4: By prespecifying the goals, the team was able to work efficiently.
meanings.sent5: Prespecifying the timeline allowed for better planning of the event.
